lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I'm learning the difference that one person can make in our communites and around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Working with young leaders and campers as we find God's plan for our lives in creative & fun settings.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Supplies gently used/refurbished servers, networking (Cisco, Nortel, etc.) laptops, pcs, data storage, and more for savings up to 90% off retail. 100% lifetime replacement warranty, direct warehouse shipping make your purchase easy and reliable.
lender.occupational_info: Supplies gently used/refurbished servers, networking (Cisco, Nortel, etc.) laptops, pcs, data storage, and more for savings up to 90% off retail. 100% lifetime replacement warranty, direct warehouse shipping make your purchase easy and reliable.

lender.name: Diederik
lender.loan_because: I believe in people that take responsibility and are actively making changes.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I believe in the goodness of people.
lender.occupational_info: I research how to help people and the environment at the same time.

lender.name: Helen Deffenbacher
lender.loan_because: Kiva is one of the best opportunities that I know of to work with others to change the world.
lender.occupational_info:
One of our extended family's goals each year is to work with others in our local and global community to help make the world a better place. A number of our projects are contained in our book, Green Philanthropy For Families: 160 Simple Earth Honoring Gifts, Actions, Activities and Projects. You can download a free pdf at Powells Books: www.powells.com/biblio/61-9780615331157-0
We are happy to be part of the Kiva community, and we honor the individuals, families, and groups in it.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I am a struggling entrepreneur myself, but I love the idea that I can help another person in a similar situation somewhere in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I write software that will save shoppers money, give manufacturers the best way to influence their customers, and all while helping charities all over the world.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: it makes the world better... : ) I believe in our global family and that the little we can do for others matters... Thank you for your wonderful initiatives!

lender.name: LaToya
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a chairity.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: Such an amazing way to give and help on a grass roots level!!
lender.occupational_info: I am the GM of a car dealership and am thankful for all the opportunites I have had as a women.

lender.name: Sanjay
lender.loan_because:
"If you wanna make the world a better place, take a look in the mirror and make that change" - Michael Jackson
I've been good at expressing big concepts in eloquent words, nor have I ever bothered to write something coherent on an online profile. But microfinance - and Kiva - is something different. Through our meagre sums, we can empower entrepreneurs throughout the world to make a positive impact on themselves, their families and the community around them.
Microfinance can often do a lot more than simple aid; as Lao Tzu once said, "give a man a fish, and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, and you feed him for a lifetime." Through Kiva, we're giving him the fishing equipment to get started.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze investment opportunities.

lender.name: Ernesto
lender.loan_because: I support the idea of helping others to improve their quality of life.

lender.name: Siobhan
lender.loan_because: I believe this is one of the best methods of alleviating poverty.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: I care and I can help
lender.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit here that provides services to homeless, farmworkers, people in recovery from drugs and alcohol and helps the disabled. I manage their contracts and write grants.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: Kiva entrepreneurs impress and inspire me. I hope to make at least a little difference in the lives of some people I have not met.

lender.name: Hishaam
lender.loan_because: KIVA is delivering direct economic empowerment to individuals and families and fulfilling untapped potentials to change lives. KIVA is positively impacting families and communities around the world and doing so directly at the micro level. I am proud to be part of KIVA especially if I can help cut red tape and change a dream into reality. I was extended many opportunities in life and I am now very lucky and blessed, courtesy of KIVA, to do the same for others.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I've been successful and feel that others should be given the same opportunity to achieve success through work. I don't feel that success should be limited by access to a bank so I'm happy to contribute in my small way.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a contract Information Architect and I work with businesses large and small to make their websites easier to use and more successful.

lender.loan_because: We enjoy providing a means to financial principles that will change lives
lender.occupational_info: Tricia teaches Chemistry at a local college and Troy invests in real estate.

lender.occupational_info: i manage and cook in a delicatessen in Queensland Australia

lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with so much. I hope my small contributions will help someone achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help make drugs that help people

lender.loan_because: Good way to connect to people across the world and learn a bit about different cultures and people.

lender.occupational_info: Assisting an elderly woman in and outside her apartment twice a week for a total of 5 hours

lender.loan_because: I think this project is very important, as it gives people the possibility to loan money to other people in difficulties who really need it!
lender.occupational_info: after I had been working for 20 years in an office in vienna, my company closed. Fortunately I live in a very social country, so I have the possibility to go to school again and i decided to study medical massage.this will last about 1 year.

lender.loan_because: This is a great way to support growth of developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.loan_because: Because you only get to keep what you give away... what's a smile worth? and I love empowering people!
lender.occupational_info: I work in IT, although these days I have lots of little side projects that keep me occupied...the pic was drawn by a quadriplegic friend of mine (Wayne Dyer) using a charcoal stick & his mouth..amazing...

lender.name: Mark Squance
lender.loan_because: A little often goes a long way -- I hope it Helps ;-)
lender.occupational_info:
I'd rather see a sermon than hear one any day; I'd rather one should walk with me than merely tell the way: The eye's a better pupil and more willing than the ear, fine counsel is confusing, but example's always clear.
With a lift of his chin, and a bit of a grin Without any doubting or 'quit it,' He started to sing, as he tackled the thing That couldn't be done, and he did it !

lender.loan_because: empowerment is priceless:)
lender.occupational_info: I work with children ages 5 -12 years with moderate to severe behavior issues, stemming from abuse, psychiatric or physiological impairments.

lender.occupational_info: Learning is a great experience and the more you learn the wiser you will be.

lender.occupational_info: As part of the Teacher Education program at Regis University, we help university students become teachers for preschool to high school school students. Regis, as a Jesuit institution, promotes social justice for all--another reason for the commitment for me to help women around the world.

lender.loan_because: I believe that providing education and opportunity to women is the key to world peace.
lender.occupational_info: My paid work is to fill in for elementary school teachers when they cannot be at school. As a volunteer, I am a mentor to children, most from hispanic immigrant families. I also serve as an ombudsman in a nursing home.

lender.occupation: a peson who provides a job to teachers
lender.loan_because: God gave me the ability to do so and help others in need
lender.occupational_info: I am SATISFIED!

lender.loan_because: Help make the world a better place and help others improve the quality of their lives
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses to secure funding, develop new products and grow

lender.loan_because: everyone should!

lender.name: susan

lender.occupational_info: interesting,very hard,heartbreaking at times but satisfying.

lender.loan_because: "The poor stay poor not because they are lazy but because they have no access to capital." - Milton Friedman

lender.name: Bugra
lender.loan_because: I think that microcredits are a great means to help many people in developping countries. It's just a small effort, but has a big effect on people's lives. A sustainable world is possible, and this is one of the principles that really work. Many thanks to Kiva for making this possible.

lender.loan_because: it helps me give back to others and help people accomplish things that they might not be able to do on their own.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people of all ages who are injured. I help them learn re-learn skills such as walking and getting in and out of bed. I help them get stronger. For some people that are not able to walk, I help get them equipment, such as wheelchairs that will help them get around and improve their quality of life.

lender.loan_because: We are long-time entrepreneurs ourselves
lender.occupational_info: We assist the elderly when they need to move by doing their sorting, packing, unpacking and new home setup so that they don't have to do it themselves.

lender.occupational_info: Roy is a wildlife photographer who loves his work. Robin is a recruiter that finds jobs for people, including many female executives

lender.name: Society of Economics
lender.loan_because: Kiva.org is the perfect match of economics, finance, and a belief that we can make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Society of Economics is the premier economics club on the University of Northern Colorado campus. We complete projects that are fueled by a passion to make the world a better place and fulfill a real need. In addition, our Honor Society Omicron Delta Epsilon puts the best and brightest of our department to work helping our campus, our community, and all over the world. Please feel free to write us at SocietyOfEconomics@gmail.com

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: An old man walking along a beach one day, notices a youth picking up starfish and flinging them into the sea. The old man asks, "Why are you doing this?" The young man responds, "If left on the beach 'til the noonday sun, they will die." "But," protests the old man, "the beach goes on for miles and there are millions of starfish. How can your effort make any difference?" Looking at the starfish in his hand, the young man replies, "It makes a very real difference to this one." -- Source Unknown
lender.occupational_info: I am currently taking a business administration program with a major in accounting.

lender.loan_because: Buying tools those support my job and add any worker.

lender.name: Bernie
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people realize their dreams - especially for their children
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher. I help others learn. I am a leader. I help others find their way. I am a coach. I help individuals and groups achieve their goals.

lender.name: Amit
lender.loan_because: I want to do my bit for the society

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because:
I want to help entrepreneurs in developing countries in sustainable ways. I also pleased to support people who do not apparently support discriminatory and perverse belief practices.
Besides being a Humanist and member of the Aetheist/Agnostic etc group I am pleased to give my support to the church of the Flying Spaghetti monster in showing these discriminatory religions that a sense of humour and rationalism wins over superstition and hatred. Pastafarians of the church of the Flying Spaghetti monster welcomes all and any people and does not discriminate against people or encourage hatred. People have a right to dislike pasta and we are happy with that!
lender.occupational_info: I help plan and implement alterations to railway lines. I am also involved in the transition movement, the local initiative of which is the subject of the web page below:

lender.name: Garett
lender.loan_because: I care. I want to help give opportunities to people and make the world a better place.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: as Desmond Tutu said "Everyone of us has the potential to do something that will make a difference."

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Feel like I should do at least one thing beneficial to mankind
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to play games

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I decided that this seemed a better way to help than to give money to charities where you can never be sure where it ends up!
lender.occupational_info: Helping kids to learn and acheive their potential.

lender.name: marisa
lender.occupational_info: sometimes hard, sometimes funny

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: It's a real and immediate way to help others improve their lives.

lender.name: Jonetta
lender.loan_because:
For the past two years I have given up something I am too attached to. It is sort of a prolonged fasting from a specific substance, to keep me focused on my Savior, my self-control and to help me remember that this life I have been given is not all about me!
The first time I did this was 2008, and I gave up all coffee - and I mean to tell you, I was having SEVERAL cups of cream-and-sugar-loaded coffee a day. I stopped cold turkey and didn't have a sip all year - I didn't even have a bite of tiramisu!
This past year, 2009 I gave up all soda/coke since I had so readily taken that up in my year without coffee. :)
This year I am giving up my $40 each month that I receive in spending money from our family budget.
This is the money I receive to buy Starbucks, clothing (you can get a LOT for $40 at thrift stores!) music, books, etc.
I will have to rely on my thrifty Freegan-ness for those luxuries. :)
I will be lending my spending money to various entrepreneurs here on Kiva instead of using that money on myself.
I cannot wait to see the families and communities my small amount of money can make an impact on!
lender.occupational_info:
I am a homeschooling mother of 2 and my husband is a youth pastor at our church. We try to keep our lives focused on giving rather than taking.
The only world impact we have had so far is with our mission trips to Peru, during which our church has helped to build an orphanage and young mothers' home.
I can't wait to see the impact my little amount of spending money will make on the rest of the world!

lender.name: Venki
lender.loan_because: I came from former family and I would like to help poor family who is doing forming as a profession.

lender.loan_because: I love people and believe in the connectedness of humanity.
lender.occupational_info: I work with college students helping them learn how to build healthy relationships with others, contribute to the community around them and make decisions about life after college.

lender.name: Miami Shores Montessori
lender.loan_because: Students, parents and teachers at our school would like to make a positive impact in the lives of people who are less fortunate than us. Our goal is to help a family on each continent and throughout the year, connect each region to our Geographical study of nations.
lender.occupational_info: Miami Shores Montessori School strives at providing children with rich and stimulating educational experiences based on Montessori principles. We cultivate a spirit of cooperation and respect and hope to make a difference in the world one child at a time.

lender.name: Stephenie
lender.loan_because: I want to help individuals be successful in their goals, and the world to reduce extreme poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I sell products on the internet.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: We are a company specializing in Windows recovery and repair, information on creating Windows boot disks and CDs, and troubleshooting guides for when Windows does not boot or work properly.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I think it's a wonderful idea and a way to give someone a chance to make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a lab testing products and raw ingredients for purity and certain specifications using chemical analysis.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I want to help women in developing countries overcome the obstacles they face.

lender.name: Gitanjali
lender.loan_because: it empowers

lender.name: Sylvie

lender.occupational_info: I like helping people.

lender.name: Connie and David
lender.loan_because: Albert Schweitzer: "I don't know what your destiny will be, but one thing I know: the only ones among you who will be really happy are those who will have sought and found how to serve."

lender.name: Daniel

lender.loan_because: I have been truly fortunate in my life and there have been many people who have helped and encouraged me along the way. I truly believe in paying it forward...
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife and mom of two children. I do our company books but my passion is my art which allows me to communicate and express myself.

lender.name: Cadence
lender.loan_because: It's one way to value each individual and help others achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: Wherever I can, in whatever small way I can, I try to follow the example of the most loving beings I know.

lender.loan_because: We are mothers of Texas who care and wish to help the world become a better place.

lender.name: Carson

lender.occupational_info: Applying 25th century solutions to 21st century problems.

lender.name: Brad & Erin
lender.loan_because: We believe that supporting women entrepreneurs can be a key way to help disrupt the cycle of poverty and oppression in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: We both specialize in the field of corporate marketing, however my wife also leads the area of corporate responsibility (this includes the firm's focus on education, environment and entrepreneurship) for a major professional services firm in Canada.

lender.name: Edward Redlich
lender.occupation: Commercial real estate in Miami, USA
lender.loan_because: Small business owners deserve help from each other voluntarily, with private donations made willingly. Corruption, exploitation, coercion and over-taxation by both government and business is morally wrong. As an American, I need to help show my foreign friends that free-trade. liberty and capitalism are the best ways to help the people of all countries. I volunteer these funds. They are not given by force via taxation. I'm also proof that Atheists are compassionate to our fellow man.
lender.occupational_info: I assist manufacturers, freight forwarders, logistics, importers and exporters with their warehouse space needs in Miami (bodegas en Miami), Florida, USA.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I want to help women and their families achieve health, security, and happiness in life! :)
lender.occupational_info: I provide training for staff in a hospital.

lender.name: James
